scripts.desktop:package: cross-env DESTINATION=desktop yarn workspace interface build && yarn workspace desktop package
scripts.desktop:make: cross-env DESTINATION=desktop yarn workspace interface build && yarn workspace desktop make --verbose
scripts.server-web:run: cross-env DESTINATION=server-web yarn workspace interface build && yarn workspace server-web build && yarn workspace server-web start
scripts.start: concurrently "yarn watch-copy-types" "yarn interface:start" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && yarn desktop:start"
scripts.github-page: cross-env DESTINATION=github yarn workspace interface build && yarn workspace docs build:demo && gh-pages -d dist-interface-github
